Name: Barnacle Bill
Ingredients: 15 ml Chilled water omit if using wet ice
Instructions: Select and pre-chill an Old-fashioned glass .
STRAIN into glass filled with crushed ice.
Review: This sweet drink is best enjoyed after a meal on a warm night.
History: Adapted from Victor Bergeron's Trader Vic's Bartender's Guide (1972 revised edition) .
Nutrition: One serving of Barnacle Bill contains 136 calories
